resources.string: Note: N/A means either the fish is not eligable for a state record or there is no current record for the species.

Use this area to create your very own profile!

This profile will allow you to:
•Set a profile picture
•View your most recent catch
•View your total catches that you have logged
•View the species you have favorited

To create a profile, just click the Add button in the upper right!

Please use this area to add a license! You can throw the license on this app so you do not have to take it with you!
This feature will allow you to add:

•State
•Name
•License Number
•License Type
•Issue and Expiration Date
•Date of Birth
•Hunter Ed.
•Store multiple licenses (up to 5)

To create a license, just click the Add button in the upper right!

string-array.name: state_array
string-array.item: Choose from the following default states:
